title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SOL Gains 10.8% as Nearly All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) rose 8.0%, joining Solana (SOL) as a top performer.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2520.12, up 4.4% (+106.71) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Nineteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SOL (+10.8%) and BCH (+8.0%).

Laggards: ICP (-0.7%) and POL (+0.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: Nineteen of twenty assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with significant gains like SOL (+10.8%) and BCH (+8.0%), indicating broad market positivity.
